400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The request could not be understood by the server.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You need to be logged in to access this resource.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Not Found
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

409.title: Conflict
409.message: The request conflicts with the current state of the server.

422.title: Unprocessable Entity
422.message: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You've made too many requests. Please try again later.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.message: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.message: The server didn't receive a timely response from the upstream server.

auth.accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
auth.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address before logging in.
auth.tokenExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again.
auth.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists.
auth.weakPassword: Password is too weak. Please use a stronger password.
auth.socialLoginFailed: Failed to login with {{provider}}. Please try again.
auth.accountNotFound: No account found with this email address.
auth.samePassword: New password must be different from the current password.

validation.maxLength: Must be no more than {{max}} characters
validation.fileType: File type not allowed. Allowed types: {{types}}
validation.futureDate: Date must be in the future
validation.pastDate: Date must be in the past
validation.dateRange: End date must be after start date
validation.ageRestriction: You must be at least {{age}} years old

wedding.venueBooked: Venue is already booked for this date
wedding.vendorUnavailable: Vendor is not available for this date
wedding.bookingConflict: There's a scheduling conflict with another booking
wedding.paymentRequired: Payment is required to confirm this booking
wedding.cancellationNotAllowed: Cancellation is not allowed at this time
wedding.registryItemUnavailable: This registry item is no longer available

vendor.noAvailability: No availability for the selected date
vendor.maximumBookings: Maximum bookings reached for this period
vendor.serviceAreaRestriction: Service not available in this area

payment.duplicatePayment: This payment has already been processed

system.maintenance: System is under maintenance. Please try again later.
system.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
system.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
system.fileUploadFailed: File upload failed. Please try again.
system.emailSendFailed: Failed to send email. Please try again.
system.smsSendFailed: Failed to send SMS. Please try again.
system.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please slow down.
system.browserNotSupported: Your browser is not supported. Please update or use a different browser.
system.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page.

permissions.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
permissions.upgradePlan: Please upgrade your plan to access this feature

generic.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support
